text: Dari jalan raya yg sepi dan minim penerangan..tiba tibaasuk di lungkungan yg indah. Menyambut kami dengan hangat. Sayang untuk snorkling kami butuh waktu lebih lama utk stay karena harus jangkau pulau pulau kecil yang indah di seberang hitel ini
title: Seperti berlibur di rumah nenek. Kebun dan taman khas flores sangat natural dan traditional.

text: Cocok untuk bersantai, sambil menikmati pemandangan laut. Ada kolam renang dekat pantai, jadi bisa berenang sambil memandang matahari tenggelam. Kamar-kamar dibangun dari kayu dan nyaman, dengan harga 500rb keatas/malam. Dari kota Maumere bisa dicapai 30 menit saja, ke arah Waigete (atau ke arah timur, larantuka), bisa dengan ojek 20-30rb, atau naik angkot 2x. Resort ada disebelah kiri, agak masuk kedalam.
title: Resort tepi pantai..

text:
We had a fantastic time at Budi Sun resort and would encourage others to go ahead and stay here. We went for the inside room next to the kitchen and it was great. Extremely clean and not noisy throughout the night when you want to sleep. 
The managers in charge of guest experience are fantastic and so helpful. Their English is great which is helpful when you have some questions. It was my birthday during our stay and the staff made me feel extra special and made me some lovely birthday pancakes, it was a really nice extra touch.
The free breakfast was the best we've had throughout Flores and we had beautiful evenings meals here also.
The dive shop attached to this hotel is very professional, The dive master is extremely experienced and we felt very comfortable diving with him. The dives sites we visited were soooooo incredible and we got to enjoy them on our own as there was no other divers in sight. 
We will definitely be back to stay and dive again! Thanks for a lovely stay.
title: Great hotel and base for incredible diving

text:
- Dinner has to be ordered in advance. But this is worth it. We had the best food during our travel through Flores and Bali here in Budi Sun resort. 
- The staff is very nice, professional and helpful. 
- Booked a snorkeling trip to beautiful spots. 
- Breakfast was delicious and sufficient portion. 
- Room was clean and comfortable. 
- Great pool.

- Not really bad, but there is not a lot around the resort you can go to. You will need a car or scooter.
title: Peace and quiet. Delicious food.

text: Without any doubt it could be said that we had one of our best hotel-experiences at budisun during our travel through Flores! Besides the amazing & delicious breakfast (which is included in the price btw) our room was perfectly clean and well decorated. In addition we had the chance to have an inspiring discussion with the owner about Flores and its ongoing development. She also speaks proper German as she lived in Germany with her family for a couple of years. The rest of the staff was courteously and always managed to make time for a chat even when busy. Plausibly because the family is still one of the most important things in Flores, and speaking to or rather interacting with each other are essential parts of the everyday life around here. To sum it up: we had an unforgettable time & the stuff who welcomed us so warmly, made us feel at home!
title: A highly recommendable hotell

text: We had a lovely stay here at Budi Sun... the rooms were clean and had hot fresh water. The staff were friendly and helpful.The food was good... i have to be honest, the grounds could do with some TLC as could some of the sunbeds... otherwise it was great though!
title: Lovely stay

text: I had to write this review most importantly to praise the staff. I've done a lot of travelling and stayed in hundreds of hotels, hostels and resorts. The staff at Budisun would have to be the most accomodating, kind, friendly, helpful and attentive people I've met! Thanks for such a great stay and for the kindness of all of your staff members :)
title: The staff go above and beyond!!

text:
This is as luxurious as it gets in the heart of Flores, but it's no Hilton. The rooms are nice, with good wifi, A/C, the showers have hot water, the resort is small and each guest gets a lot of attention. The staff (especially Joseph) were very friendly and helpful. The food is good, and they are happy to accommodate any dietary preferences (we are vegetarian). There is an extensive selection of fruit juices to choose from. The food prices are very reasonable. The one minus was the pool, which had a green color which means algae and therefore bacteria also is growing, so we decided not to use it.

This is a tropical area, so be prepared to encounter bugs (especially flies) and various critters. We went in dry season, and there wasn’t much of a mosquito problem  –  still, we saw one or two.

The place is rather isolated, so there is not much to do. However, if you just want a few days to relax it is great. Also, if you expect a perfectly manicured beach with a lifeguard, you won’t find it here! There are a few fishing villages nearby, but basically you have the beach to yourself. The beach starts off with black sand,  then there is a layer of rocks, and once you get into the water you’ll find sand again. The ground is silt-like in some places, and with sea grass in some places; water shoes would have been helpful. Nevertheless, if you look around you’ll find some spots good for swimming, at high tide (when you can’t see the little islands in front of the property). Be careful though – we once saw a sea snake, which is shy but venomous.

The sunsets over the Flores sea are wonderful. Also amazing was the snorkeling day trip the hotel arranges to Pangabatang Island. I wish we did that every day!  (You can arrange a trip at the reception.) We saw lots of colorful corals and fishes, for example blue starfish (Linckia laevigata).  I think this hotel is used more for divers and we did not dive but I could imagine the diving would have been great since the snorkeling was so good.
title: Beautiful small resort in a remote area

text:
Budisun, simply has a nice feel about it. Its a lovely place. Ive stayed three times now and will continue to come back. the Coconut garden next door may be newer and fancier ans is the new Capha hotel in town, but both lack the authenticity and feel of Budi Sun. Neti the owner is lovely as are all the staff. Nice clean pool, very clean rooms and a nice location. As tourism is upgrading in the city they may face challenges keeping up with new styles and trends, but to be honest i cant think of a place i'd rather retreat to for a long weekend....

lovely home made bread, good fresh fish, and nice cold drinks. yummy cocktails :)
I will be back
title: I love Budisun, lovely people, lovely location, lovely people

text:
Stayed for 3 nights in this resort. The rooms are clean and the A/C was working well. However, the WI-FI was not working at all but sometimes if you asked them they would turn on hotspot which was slow. 
The beach is not scenic, but the restaurant is awesome with reasonable prices and variety. The service was great and relaxed. They could easily rent out a few bikes. 
We organized a snorkelling trip for 2 persons to the nearby islands for snorkelling for 500 k Rupiah from Lena Resort, since the BUDI offered the trip for the higher price. 
Overall, I can recommend this place to stay relaxed but do not expect to see picturesque beaches. For that you need to take a trip to nearby islands!
title: Relaxing value for money resort with great food and awesome service

text: We stayed here in January, with our family, and enjoyed it. The rooms were nice and good value, the breakfast was very generous and delicious; enjoyed the home-made bread. The beach in front is lovely, though not necessarily the best for snorkelling, as there has been a lot of reef damage. But otherwise it's a lovely place, with a generous garden, and lots of space for kids to run around, plus a pool.
title: Lovely place, nice rooms and lovely staff

owner_response.text:
Hello Marianne,
thank you for your kind and positive review.
Günter
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We arrived of a live aboard looking for some easy last dives and down time for two days... 

Diving fell through completely and we did a very quiet day instead. The resort does not have own dive facilities and the coordination with the actual dive resorts ended up with the message "booked out". Well...

Food and rooms are great if you look for a quaint place to hang and you can do with the usual driver excursions into east Flores... 

The pool is nice. It partially taken over by local kids that are not generating a comfortable feeling for female guests.

That said - food is great, showers hot and the rooms are spotless. So not bad if you need a landing bad coming into Maumere but not a diving resort.
title: Quaint and cute but not a dive resort

text: we had a few nights here, I did want to dive but unfortunately they did not have a dive master, wonderfull staff !! and the cooks meals are lovely !  the pool we had to ourselves and that was great too, for what we had we liked it. the grounds could do with some work and that would draw more people but then again do you want more people ?  as I said the staff are really great and make the place, Joseph in particular thank you
title: the front row rooms are the ones to get !

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We just spent two nights in the family suite with our two daughters, ages 11 and 7. Both rooms conveniently had a kettle and a fridge (we'd bought beer and milk in town so wanted to keep it cold, of course) and we loved the outdoor veranda for watching butterflies, bees and geckos in the lovely garden. But the best part of Budi Sun.. well actually two things.. the food and the staff. The chef, Marta, makes the best avocado salad we've ever had. The garlic chicken and tomato salad, also winners. Breakfast is included.. fresh fruit and a hot meal of your choice.. the mie goreng was fantastic and so was the avocado juice! And the staff are all amazing.. Joseph has the best smile.. Thank you Budi Sun!
title: A tropical version of an English Garden

owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind and positive comment.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We have just had a wonderful week at Budi Sun. Quiet at the moment, off season, you are looked after just so well. The main staff of Joseph, Rido and Sandy could not be more friendly and helpful. The cooking is sensational which is important as you are 12 km from town in a very tranquil setting. The sea view bungalow was just right with a v comfortable bed. If you don't stay, at least come here to eat.
They organise all your needs,; diving, snorkelling, motor bike hire, day trips...nothing is too much for them.
Fantastic place in a wonderful location.
title: What a pleasure

owner_response.text: Thanks for your comment.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed here 4 days. Really good food. Good beachcombing, clean pool and helpful friendly staff. Room was luxurious for the price. Not equipped for diving at this time. That was disappointing. All in all, a great  experience.
title: Good food nice rooms

owner_response.text: Thanks for your comment.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The ocean view bungalows are really nice even though the actual ocean view is limited. Stayed one night in the garden view bungalows aswell... you should get the ocean view ones if they are available!

When we visited there was No dive guide which is a minus for a diving resort.... The gear I saw looked nice. Ok snorkling if you Go in to the right of the tree that "grows in the ocean".

Lots of locals using the hotel facilites (pool, restaurant, beach benches).

Nice, friendly staff. Good food! Nice laid back ambience!
